thread.title: Madonna brings "Rebel Heart" to Portland's Moda Center (photos)
thread.title_full: Madonna brings "Rebel Heart" to Portland's Moda Center (photos) | OregonLive.com

author: Beth Nakamura | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Madonna brings "Rebel Heart" to Portland's Moda Center (photos)
text:
Madonna brought her " Rebel Heart " tour to the Moda Center tonight -- her first Portland concert appearance since 1985.
Scroll the gallery for a look of Madonna's performance during the first three songs of the night. And check back later in the week for PDX Street Style, which will take a look at Madonna's Portland fans' clothes.
Beth Nakamura 503-221-8218
Twitter: @bethnakamura
Instagram: @bethnakamura
